GET /api.description: Serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the API

GET /api/users/:id.description: Retrieves a single user by their id

GET /api/users/:id/sessions.description: Retrieves all sessions for a user by their id

GET /api/users/:userId/sessions/live.description: Retrieves the live session for a user by their id

GET /api/users/:userId/sessions/live/req.description: Retrieves all the requests for the live session for a user by their id

GET /api/sessions/:id/requests.description: Retrieves all requests for a session by its id

GET /api/sessions/:id/comments.description: Retrieves all comments for a user by their id

GET /api/requests/:requestId/comments.description: Retrieves all comments for a request by its id

POST /api/sessions/:sessionId/requests.description: Creates a new request for a session by its id

POST /api/requests/:requestId/comments.description: Creates a new comment for a request by its id

PATCH /api/requests/:requestId/status.description: Updates the status of a request by its id

PATCH /api/requests/:requestId/votes.description: Updates the votes for a request by its id

PATCH /api/comments/:commentId/pinned.description: Updates the pinned status of a comment by its id

DELETE /api/sessions/:sessionId.description: Deletes a session by its id

DELETE /api/requests/:requestId.description: Deletes a request by its id

DELETE /api/comments/:commentId.description: Deletes a comment by its id

DELETE /api/sessions/:sessionId/requests.description: Deletes all requests for a session by its id
